```{r}
library(rpart)

library(stringr)
```
```{r}
#Function to wraps long split labels over multiple lines.
#Source: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22618751/rpart-plot-text-shorter
split_fun <- function(x, labs, digits, varlen, faclen)
{
    # replace commas with spaces (needed for strwrap)
    labs <- gsub(",", " ", labs)
    for(i in 1:length(labs)) {
        # split labs[i] into multiple lines
        labs[i] <- paste(strwrap(labs[i], width=25), collapse="\n")
    }
    labs
}
```

```{r}
#5th ITERATION
#Select target and predictor variables
target_field <- 62
predictor_fields <- c(9,13:15,17:24)
model_fields <- c(target_field,predictor_fields)
#metadata2$english_labels[predictor_fields]
#to make the code more concise we simplify the formula and select the 
#predictors subseting the imput dataset
tree5_formula <- as.formula(paste0(metadata2$english_labels[target_field],"~."))
#We create the decision tree model using rpart function
tree5_model <- rpart(tree5_formula, method="class", data=hogares.clean[training_index,model_fields],control = rpart.control(cp = 0.01),, parms = list(prior = c(.4,.35,.25)))
printcp(tree5_model)
```
```{r}
png(filename="model_01_tree5.png", 
    units="in", 
    width=5, 
    height=4, 
    pointsize=12, 
    res=720)
rpart.plot(tree5_model, extra=104, fallen.leaves = T, type=4,split.fun=split_fun,faclen = 30,box.palette = list("Greens", "Grays", "Reds"))
dev.off()
shell("model_01_tree5.png")
```

```{r}
#Confusion matrix test set
pred<-predict(tree5_model,hogares.clean[-training_index,model_fields],type = "class")
tree5_conf_matrix<-confusionMatrix(pred, hogares.clean[-training_index,target_field])
performance_log <- data.frame(name=names(tree5_conf_matrix$overall),
                              value=tree5_conf_matrix$overall)
byclass_table <- melt(tree5_conf_matrix$byClass)

field_name_table <- function(row) paste(row[1],row[2],sep = "_") %>% str_replace( "Class: ", "")
byclass_table[1] <- apply(byclass_table[c(1,2)],1, field_name_table)
byclass_table[2] <- NULL
names(byclass_table) <- names(performance_log)
performance_log <- rbind.data.frame(performance_log,byclass_table)
tree5_conf_matrix

```
